EmailTemplate.name: TSE-2018-06-19-RD-Sponsored-Raleigh.Invitation 1.Email Invite 1
EmailTemplate.subject: You're Invited: Raleigh IT Networking Dinner
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
<[[https://bit.ly/vip-raleigh]]> Hi {{lead.First Name:default=there}},
We’d like to cordially invite you to an exclusive networking event in Raleigh on June 19th at Second Empire Restaurant and Tavern.
Enterprises are facing incredible pressure to modernize and transform their IT to become a digital business, leading many organizations to reimagine their hybrid cloud strategy. Determining which workloads go on-premises, which go in the cloud, and how to manage the transition is challenging – and mistakes are costly.
Raleigh IT Networking Dinner Second Empire Restaurant and Tavern Tuesday, Jun 19th | 6:00 PM
Throughout the evening, you’ll have the chance to share knowledge on tackling these challenges and learn how organizations like yours are adopting workload automation at the scale of the hybrid cloud.
We hope you will join us for this discussion by registering via the link below: https://bit.ly/vip-raleigh <[[https://bit.ly/vip-raleigh]]>
Sincerely,
The Turbonomic Team
